attributes.action: Reduce Prices for 16-18 Year Olds still in full-time education on Public Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To get prices for people who do not have jobs and still in full-time education in college or in 6th forms-£7 a return ticket on buses or £5 return on trains is a ridiculous amount when not under full-time employment! sign up now if you agree with me!-make GB great again!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
